mapper.update:
update tb_repair
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_no = #{record.orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
additional = #{record.additional,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`type` = #{record.type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
category = #{record.category,jdbcType=TINYINT},
rescue = #{record.rescue,jdbcType=BIT},
accident = #{record.accident,jdbcType=BIT},
add_time = #{record.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
arrival_time = #{record.arrivalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
finish_time = #{record.finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
`status` = #{record.status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
job_process_status = #{record.jobProcessStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
rescue_status = #{record.rescueStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
`state` = #{record.state,jdbcType=TINYINT},
fault_phenomenon_id = #{record.faultPhenomenonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
temp_fault_phenomenon_id = #{record.tempFaultPhenomenonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sys_fault_diagnostic_id = #{record.sysFaultDiagnosticId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
temp_fault_diagnostic_id = #{record.tempFaultDiagnosticId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dispatch_user_id = #{record.dispatchUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
vehicle_id = #{record.vehicleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
org_maintenance_id = #{record.orgMaintenanceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
org_group_id = #{record.orgGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
worker_id = #{record.workerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
factory_area_id = #{record.factoryAreaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pass_user_id = #{record.passUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
complete_user_id = #{record.completeUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
process_instance_id = #{record.processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{record.gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{record.gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update tb_repair set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_no = #{record.orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, additional = #{record.additional,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{record.type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, category = #{record.category,jdbcType=TINYINT}, rescue = #{record.rescue,jdbcType=BIT}, accident = #{record.accident,jdbcType=BIT}, add_time = #{record.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, arrival_time = #{record.arrivalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, finish_time = #{record.finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `status` = #{record.status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, job_process_status = #{record.jobProcessStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, rescue_status = #{record.rescueStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, `state` = #{record.state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, fault_phenomenon_id = #{record.faultPhenomenonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, temp_fault_phenomenon_id = #{record.tempFaultPhenomenonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_fault_diagnostic_id = #{record.sysFaultDiagnosticId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, temp_fault_diagnostic_id = #{record.tempFaultDiagnosticId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dispatch_user_id = #{record.dispatchUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vehicle_id = #{record.vehicleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, org_maintenance_id = #{record.orgMaintenanceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, org_group_id = #{record.orgGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, worker_id = #{record.workerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, factory_area_id = #{record.factoryAreaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pass_user_id = #{record.passUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, complete_user_id = #{record.completeUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, process_instance_id = #{record.processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{record.gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{record.gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
additional = #{additional,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`type` = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
category = #{category,jdbcType=TINYINT},
rescue = #{rescue,jdbcType=BIT},

`status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_repair set order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, additional = #{additional,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, category = #{category,jdbcType=TINYINT}, rescue = #{rescue,jdbcType=BIT}, accident = #{accident,jdbcType=BIT}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, arrival_time = #{arrivalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, finish_time = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, job_process_status = #{jobProcessStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, rescue_status = #{rescueStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, fault_phenomenon_id = #{faultPhenomenonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, temp_fault_phenomenon_id = #{tempFaultPhenomenonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_fault_diagnostic_id = #{sysFaultDiagnosticId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, temp_fault_diagnostic_id = #{tempFaultDiagnosticId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dispatch_user_id = #{dispatchUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vehicle_id = #{vehicleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, org_maintenance_id = #{orgMaintenanceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, org_group_id = #{orgGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, worker_id = #{workerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, factory_area_id = #{factoryAreaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pass_user_id = #{passUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, complete_user_id = #{completeUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, process_instance_id = #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

sql.if: and (a.status = 2 or a.status = 5 or a.factory_area_id is null)

mapper.sql:
a.id id, a.order_no orderNo, a.additional additional, a.type `type`, a.category category, a.rescue rescue, a.accident accident, a.add_time addTime, a.finish_time finishTime, a.status `status`, a.rescue_status rescueStatus, a.state `state`, a.user_id userId, a.vehicle_id vehicleId, a.org_maintenance_id orgMaintenanceId, a.org_group_id orgGroupId, a.worker_id workerId, a.process_instance_id processInstanceId, a.gmt_create gmtCreate, a.gmt_modified gmtModified, b.name groupName, c.user_name driverName, d.vehicle_no vehicleNo, e.name workStation
from tb_repair a left join tb_organization b on b.id = a.org_group_id left join tb_user c on c.id = a.user_id left join tb_vehicle d on d.id = a.vehicle_id left join tb_factory_area e on a.factory_area_id
mapper.select:
select
where a.job_process_status = #{processStatus} and a.category = 1 and a.org_maintenance_id = #{organizationId} and a.state = 1 order by gmt_create desc

select
select count(1) from tb_repair a where a.job_process_status = #{processStatus} and a.category = 1 and a.org_maintenance_id = #{organizationId} and a.state = 1
from dual

select
where a.category = 1 and a.org_maintenance_id = #{organizationId} and a.state = 1
order by gmt_create desc

select count(1) from tb_repair a left join tb_organization b on b.id = a.org_group_id left join tb_user c on c.id = a.user_id left join tb_vehicle d on d.id = a.vehicle_id where a.category = 1 and a.org_maintenance_id = #{organizationId} and a.state = 1
